Name: Chessmates
About the game: Become black, white, or red knight at nonchess. Defeat chess en–µmies. Pawns, bishops, rooks, another knights, queens and king! You decide to beat or have mercy on them. Use dropped keys to open new levels. Features: 1. 16 levels. 2. Control a knight like in real chessboard. 3. Change color from white to black and vice versa. Sometimes you can become red, increasing strength.
